entry.title: How to Build and Push Dockerized Applications to the Azure Registry
entry.summary: A common issue on development teams is that an application might work on one developer’s computer but not on the others. Luckily, there's Docker, a popular containerization technology. It works by packing up all the components needed to run the application and then executing the application in an isolated environment.
